TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit MatchCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
type MatchCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: Represents the set of successful matches found by iteratively applying a regular expression pattern to the input string.

span.span: Represents the set of successful matches found by iteratively applying a regular expression pattern to the input string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合是不可變 （唯讀） 並沒有公用建構函式。The collection is immutable (read-only) and has no public constructor. 方法會傳回 物件。The method returns a object. 集合包含零或多個物件。The collection contains zero or more objects. 如果比對成功，集合會填入一個每次比對輸入字串中找到的物件。If the match is successful, the collection is populated with one object for each match found in the input string. 如果比對失敗時，不含集合物件，並將其屬性等於零。If the match is unsuccessful, the collection contains no objects, and its property equals zero. 當套用至特定的輸入字串的規則運算式模式，規則運算式引擎會使用其中兩項技術來建置物件：When applying a regular expression pattern to a particular input string, the regular expression engine uses either of two techniques to build the object: - 直接評估。Direct evaluation. 物件一次填入所有相符項目所產生的特定呼叫方法。The object is populated all at once, with all matches resulting from a particular call to the method. 在使用這項技術時的集合屬性存取。This technique is used when the collection's property is accessed. 它通常會填入集合的更耗費資源的方法，並牽涉到更高的效能影響。It typically is the more expensive method of populating the collection and entails a greater performance hit. - 延遲評估。Lazy evaluation. 物件的填入方式視需要以比對的相符項目為基礎。The object is populated as needed on a match-by-match basis. 它相當於規則運算式引擎呼叫方法重複並將每個相符項目加入至集合。It is equivalent to the regular expression engine calling the method repeatedly and adding each match to the collection. 透過存取集合時，使用這項技術其方法，或使用存取時`foreach`陳述式 （C# 中） 或`For Each`...`Next` （在 Visual Basic) 陳述式。This technique is used when the collection is accessed through its method, or when it is accessed using the `foreach` statement (in C#) or the `For Each`...`Next` statement (in Visual Basic). 若要逐一查看集合的成員，您應該使用您的語言所提供的反覆項目集合建構 (例如`foreach`在 C# 和`For Each`...`Next`To iterate through the members of the collection, you should use the collection iteration construct provided by your language (such as `foreach` in C# and `For Each`…`Next` 在 Visual Basic 中) 而不是擷取所傳回的列舉值方法。in Visual Basic) instead of retrieving the enumerator that is returned by the method. ## Examples 下列範例說明使用詢問的一組類別執行個體。The following example illustrates the use of the class to interrogate a set of instances. [!code-cpp[Regex_Words#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Regex_Words/CPP/words.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[Regex_Words#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Regex_Words/CS/words.cs#0)] [!code-vb[Regex_Words#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Regex_Words/VB/words.vb#0)]

span.span: The array the collection is to be copied into.

param.name: arrayIndex
param.span: The position in the array where copying is to begin.

span.span: The position in the array where copying is to begin.

summary.span: Copies all the elements of the collection to the given array starting at the given index.

span.span: Copies all the elements of the collection to the given array starting at the given index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為集合複製到陣列的指定索引處開始，目的陣列必須至少與整個集合一樣大。Because the collection is copied into the array starting at the given index, the destination array must be at least as large as the entire collection. > [!WARNING] > 這個成員是不存在於[!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]。This member is not present in the [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]. 如果您正在開發的應用程式目標[!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]，使用方法改為。If you are developing applications that target the [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)], use the method instead. 因為物件通常填入藉由使用延遲評估，嘗試將集合複製之前已經完全擴展可能會擲回例外狀況。Because the object is generally populated by using lazy evaluation, trying to copy the collection before it has been fully populated may throw a exception. 如果比對作業的逾時值是作用中，而且嘗試尋找單一相符項目超過的逾時間隔，可能擲回這個例外狀況。This exception can be thrown if a time-out value for matching operations is in effect, and the attempt to find a single match exceeds that time-out interval.

span.span: is a multi-dimensional array.
is outside the bounds of .

Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: property int Count { int get(); };

span.span: Gets the number of matches.
The number of matches.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存取的個別成員所擷取的值集合的物件屬性使規則運算式引擎填入使用直接評估集合。Accessing individual members of the object by retrieving the value of the collection's property causes the regular expression engine to populate the collection using direct evaluation. ln 對比，並呼叫方法 (或使用`foreach`C# 中的陳述式和`For Each`...`Next`陳述式在 Visual Basic 中的) 使規則運算式引擎填入上做為集合所需的基礎使用延遲評估。ln contrast, calling the method (or using the `foreach` statement in C# and the `For Each`...`Next` statement in Visual Basic) causes the regular expression engine to populate the collection on an as needed basis using lazy evaluation. 直接評估可以更為昂貴的方法，在建置比延遲評估集合。Direct evaluation can be a much more expensive method of building the collection than lazy evaluation. 因為物件通常使用延遲評估，嘗試判斷之前已經完全填入集合中的項目數可能會擲回填入例外狀況。Because the object is generally populated by using lazy evaluation, trying to determine the number of elements in the collection before it has been fully populated may throw a exception. 如果比對作業的逾時值是作用中，而且嘗試尋找單一相符項目超過的逾時間隔，可能擲回這個例外狀況。This exception can be thrown if a time-out value for matching operations is in effect, and the attempt to find a single match exceeds that time-out interval. ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性來判斷是否要呼叫方法找到符合項目。The following example uses the property to determine whether the call to the method found any matches. 如果沒有，它表示找到符合項目。If not, it indicates that no matches were found. 否則，它會列舉相符項目，並顯示其值，此時它們找不到輸入字串中的位置。Otherwise, it enumerates the matches and displays their value and the position in the input string at which they were found. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection.Count#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.matchcollection.count/cs/countex1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection.Count#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.matchcollection.count/vb/countex1.vb#1)] 規則運算式模式`\d+`比對輸入字串中的一個或多個十進位字元。The regular expression pattern `\d+` matches one or more decimal characters in an input string.

span.span: A time-out occurred.

summary.span: Provides an enumerator that iterates through the collection.

span.span: Provides an enumerator that iterates through the collection.

returns.span: An object that contains all objects within the .

span.span: An object that contains all objects within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 而不是呼叫方法來擷取列舉值，可讓您逐一物件在集合中，您應該使用群組反覆項目建構 (例如`foreach`在 C# 和`For Each`...`Next`Instead of calling the method to retrieve an enumerator that lets you iterate through the objects in the collection, you should use the group iteration construct (such as `foreach` in C# and `For Each`…`Next` 在 Visual Basic) 中提供您的程式語言。in Visual Basic) provided by your programming language. 逐一查看的成員物件使用方法 (或`foreach`C# 中的陳述式和`For Each`...`Next`陳述式在 Visual Basic 中的) 使規則運算式引擎填入上做為集合所需的基礎使用延遲評估。Iterating the members of the object using the method (or the `foreach` statement in C# and the `For Each`...`Next` statement in Visual Basic) causes the regular expression engine to populate the collection on an as needed basis using lazy evaluation. 這是類似於重複呼叫方法，這個方法，然後將 要比對結果物件。This is analogous to repeatedly calling the method, and then adding the resulting match to the object. 相反地，規則運算式引擎會使用直接評估來填入集合一次當屬性存取。In contrast, the regular expression engine uses direct evaluation to populate the collection all at once when the property is accessed. 這可以是更昂貴的方法，建置與延遲評估集合。This can be a much more expensive method of building the collection than lazy evaluation. 因為物件通常填入藉由使用延遲評估，嘗試瀏覽到下一個集合的成員可能會擲回例外狀況。Because the object is generally populated by using lazy evaluation, trying to navigate to the next member of the collection may throw a exception. 如果比對作業的逾時值是作用中，而且嘗試尋找下一個相符項目超過的逾時間隔，可能擲回這個例外狀況。This exception can be thrown if a time-out value for matching operations is in effect, and the attempt to find the next match exceeds that time-out interval.

span.span: A time-out occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 C# 中，屬性是索引子，則它在程式碼中未明確參考，但改為允許好像陣列能夠存取集合以便。In C#, the property is an indexer; it is not explicitly referenced in code, but instead allows the collection to be accessed as if it were an array. 一般而言，個別項目中由其索引存取物件的集合中的項目總數由之後才屬性。Typically, individual items in the object are accessed by their index only after the total number of items in the collection has been determined from the property. 不過，存取屬性使規則運算式引擎使用直接評估建置一次的集合。However, accessing the property causes the regular expression engine to use direct evaluation to build the collection all at once. 這是通常比逐一查看集合的使用更為昂貴方法的 C#`foreach`陳述式或 Visual Basic `For Each`...`Next`陳述式。This is typically more expensive than iterating the collection using the method, the C# `foreach` statement, or the Visual Basic `For Each`...`Next` statement. 因為物件通常填入藉由使用延遲評估，嘗試瀏覽到特定的相符項目可能會擲回例外狀況。Because the object is generally populated by using lazy evaluation, trying to navigate to a specific match may throw a exception. 如果比對作業的逾時值是作用中，而且嘗試尋找特定的符合項目超過的逾時間隔，可能擲回這個例外狀況。This exception can be thrown if a time-out value for matching operations is in effect, and the attempt to find a specific match exceeds that time-out interval. ## Examples 下列範例會剖析 Nathaniel Hawthorne 第一個句子*房子的七個 Gables*並傳回物件，其中包含與其中一個大寫或小寫"h"開頭的所有文字。The following example parses the first sentence of Nathaniel Hawthorne's *House of the Seven Gables* and returns a object that contains all words that begin with either an uppercase or lowercase "h". 屬性然後用於擷取每個字，並顯示到主控台。The property is then used to retrieve each word and display it to the console. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection.Item#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection.Item/cs/RegEx_24804.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection.Item#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.MatchCollection.Item/vb/RegEx_24804.vb#1)] 這個範例會產生下列輸出：The example produces the following output: ``` Half house huge ```
